info.interactivesystems.gamificationengine.entities.marketPlace

Class MarketPlace

  • java.lang.Object
    • info.interactivesystems.gamificationengine.entities.marketPlace.MarketPlace

  • @Entity
public class MarketPlace
extends Object
    Players can create an offer with a task for the marketplace so another player can bid to do this task and get its rewards. Via Bids an initial bid by the creator can be raised. To be able to create offers, a marketplace for the organisation is needed. If none exists yet, it first has to be created.

      • filterOfferByRole

        public List<Offer> filterOfferByRole(List<Role> roles)
        This method filters all existing offers in a marketplace by a passed role of a player. So a list is returned which contains only offers which at least match one role of the player.
        Parameters:
        roles - The player whose roles are checked if they match an offer. The list of Roles which are the hint for filtering.
        Returns:
        The list of all offers which are in the marketplace and a player is allowed to complete.

      • filterOfferByDate

        public List<Offer> filterOfferByDate(List<Offer> matchingOffers,
                                     int count)
        This method filters all matching offers to the player's roles and filters it by the date so the latest offers are presented. A list with a specific count of offers are returned that are the latest and match at least one role of the player.
        Parameters:
        matchingOffers - All offers which match at least one role of the player.
        count - The number of offers that are returned with the list.
        Returns:
        The list with the number of the second parameter and matching offers to the player's roles is returned.

      • filterOffersByPrize

        public List<Offer> filterOffersByPrize(List<Offer> matchingOffers,
                                       int count)
        This method filters all matching offers to the player's roles and filters it by the prize that can be earned. A list with x offers are returned that have the highest prize and match at least one role of the player.
        Parameters:
        matchingOffers - All offers which match at least one role of the player.
        count - The number of offers that are returned with the list.
        Returns:
        The list with the number of the second parameter and matching offers to the player's roles is returned.
